column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2020
column14: My wife loves this lipstick and wanted to share her review: she's got honey-toned skin and has been looking for a good burnt orange lipstick for some time, and this is finally it. Slightly different color than the one advertised, but that's alright. Dry, neat finish. She sipped a glass of water, and the lipstick did not run off at all. No weird smell or anything. Very light, and great quality. Just be sure to exfoliate your lips (like with a moisturizing lip sugar balm) before application.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2021
column14: I am a total lipstick snob. This product is so terrific--the color rich. Goes on glossy, ends up matte without drying. Colors are fabulous. Went and bought three.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2021
column14: Could not get it to dry and stay on.  Rubs offfrom normal wear very soon after application. Leave a bit of a stain but Crappy especially for the price.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2020
column14: I’m disappointed on the level that’s able to rubbed off. Color is nice but I would prefer the color to last a little better. This is an hour after putting it on.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2021
column14: I haven't worn it yet, but I like the packaging, and the pigment. I will  be trying it out soon.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2022
column14: Only thing that I care is color and that was not at all as color on picture. Product is not cheap but for color I wanted I was willing to pay the price. Now I have ugly, expensive lipstick. I would not recommend it to anyone. Quality of the product is ok but not better than any cheap liquid lipstick.
